original_title: Man found dead with gunshot injuries inside a car in Panadura
original_body_lines: A body of a person died due to shooting at Pinwatta in Panadura, was found inside a luxury vehicle this morning.
Police said the body was found in the driver's seat of a high luxury jeep.
The identity of the deceased has not yet been confirmed and police suspect a person riding on a motorcycle might have carried out the shooting and fled. (DSB)
